_sText:
New version with 32 spawns!!!.
==============================

Found a way to optimice entity count by huge numbers.
Eddicts number reduced from 1950 to 900 which allows 32 player spawns
Thx to a RL friend for this hint
I hope this version does not crash servers

There was a 32 spawns version months ago but it crashed servers and had a stupid bug where players couldnt plant a bomb anymore

Changes
------------------
- Bugfixes
- Optimications
- Fixed a Bug where people couldnt place a Bomb anymore
- simpler area dmg detectors (boxes instead of balls > better performance)
- throw distance increased

How to play
------------------

Aim is to kill the enemy team
With E you throw bombs
When looking on the ground while pressing E
you lay a bomb
You can kick a layed bomb by running towards the bomb
There are boxes that can be broken to aquire amazing power ups

Power ups
------------------

- Extrabomb.......you can lay 1 more bomb at same time
- Firepower.......Aoe radius increases
- Health..........You get 25 hp
- Superhealth.....Full heal and HP cap to 150
- Speed...........you run faster

### Bomb Types

- Icebomb..........Slows
- Firebomb.........Molotov Coctail
- Electrobomb......Stuns
- Windbomb.........Throws you in the air  **REMOVED**

After 3 minutes of gametime sudden death starts
which cause the lava to rise

- 16 CT Spawns
- 16 T Spawns

Current Bugs Statement
------------------

##### Players unable to lay a bomb
FIXED!!!!

Post comment
